package.label: Headless Server
package.desc: Install Nuxeo as a headless hyperscale content repository and start building your own UIs or integrations using the REST API and our Clients SDKs (Java, JavaScript, C#, Python, PHP, DART, Objective-C).

package.label: Digital Asset Management
package.desc: The Nuxeo DAM addon adds robust, extensible, Digital Asset Management capabilities for building solutions that help marketing and brand managers catalog, process, store, retrieve, and distribute rich media content, including images, audio and video.

package.label: Drive
package.desc: Nuxeo Drive enables bidirectional synchronization of content between the local desktop and the Nuxeo content repository. It handles offline modification of files and deals with concurrent updates.

package.label: Showcase Content
package.desc: The Nuxeo Showcase Content addon imports a set of showcase content so that the repository is not empty for your first steps: office documents, images, videos.

package.label: Template Rendering
package.desc: The Nuxeo Template Rendering addon provides a way to associate a Nuxeo Document with a template that can be a Word document, an Excel sheet, a Powerpoint presentation or an HTLM website and merge document properties with the template so as to produce the final document as a rendition of the initial one.

package.label: Template Rendering (with samples)
package.desc: Discover through an inspiring demo how the Template Rendering addon can improve your everyday business processes. This demo showcases the BigCorp company, generating financial reports for internal use, and case studies demonstrating their expertise for potential new customers. All being achieved by extracting their relevant content into office templates on the fly.

package.label: Live Connect
package.desc: The Nuxeo Live Connect addon allows users to reference their files stored on most common EFSS systems (Dropbox, Box, Google Drive, One Drive). User can then apply business workflows to those external ressources, benefit from full text search and edit metadata as if they were stored in the Nuxeo repository.

package.label: Nuxeo Web UI
package.desc: Thanks to its great flexibility, it is the ideal start for any Digital Asset Management, Case Managent and Document Management project. Web UI is made with great client side web technology and adopts most recent standards of the Web.

package.label: Nuxeo Spreadsheet
package.desc: The Nuxeo Spreadsheet addon allows bulk editing documents metadata starting from a content view result set, providing a spreadsheet-like user experience.

package.label: Nuxeo Vision
package.desc: The Nuxeo Vision addon provides a wrapper for Computer Vision Services. Currently it supports the Google Vision API and allows to retrieve relevant tags on images and videos. It also provides automation operations for customised re-use. The usages can easily be extended to a wide range of features including share recognition, auto-classification, OCR and more.
